name: UpCounsel
overview:
UpCounsel is a B2B marketplace for legal services, that lets any business easily find and hire the right lawyer for anything. We accomplish this through an end-to-end marketplace that efficiently connects SMBs and talented lawyers - from discovery to payment. UpCounsel handles payment and paperwork through the relationship.

UpCounsel is not a listing service. We reduce the pains of finding and evaluating lawyers by helping SMBs determine the right lawyer for their specific needs and allowing them to compare price quotes from a community of pre-screened lawyers.

For lawyers, UpCounsel can be a better value proposition than traditional listing services and advertising. Lawyers can maintain a free profile, receive free relevant leads have never worry again about getting paid for a job.
